dc_title_s: TTI Freeway AM 2017: State of Maryland
dc_description_s: ArcGIS Online (AGOL) Hosted Feature Layer which includes the MDOT SHA Top 15 Congested Roadways (AM PM) - Planning Time Travel Time Indexes (PTI / TTI) geospatial data products.MDOT SHA Top 15 Congested Roadways (AM PM) - Planning Time Travel Time Indexes (PTI / TTI) data consists of linear geometric features showing the most congested roadways during morning evening peak hours throughout the State of Maryland.MDOT SHA Top 15 Congested Roadways (AM PM) - Planning Time Travel Time Indexes (PTI / TTI) data is owned and maintained by the MDOT SHA Office of Planning Preliminary Engineering (OPPE) Travel Forecasting Analysis Division (TFAD). This data is updated on an annual basis for the prior year. This data is for the year 2017.Last Updated: 01/01/2018For additional information, contact the MDOT SHA Geospatial Technologies Team:Email: GIS@mdot.state.md.usFor additional data, visit the MDOT GIS Open Data Portal:Website: https://data.imap.maryland.gov/pages/mdot/For additional information related to the Maryland Department of Transportation (MDOT):Website: https://www.mdot.maryland.gov/For additional information related to the Maryland Department of Transportation State Highway Administration (MDOT SHA):Website: https://www.roads.maryland.gov/Home.aspxFor additional information related to the MDOT SHA Office of Planning Preliminary Engineering (OPPE):Website: https://www.roads.maryland.gov/Index.aspx PageId=125MDOT SHA Geospatial Data Legal Disclaimer:The Maryland Department of Transportation State Highway Administration (MDOT SHA) makes no warranty, expressed or implied, as to the use or appropriateness of geospatial data, and there are no warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose or use. The information contained in geospatial data is from publicly available sources, but no representation is made as to the accuracy or completeness of geospatial data. MDOT SHA shall not be subject to liability for human error, error due to software conversion, defect, or failure of machines, or any material used in the connection with the machines, including tapes, disks, CD-ROMs or DVD-ROMs and energy. MDOT SHA shall not be liable for any lost profits, consequential damages, or claims against MDOT SHA by third parties.
